name: Kasvimaa
description:
Take care of your plants, defend against slimes and garden the hell out of your little cottage yard!

  • Move: WASD
  • Use item: Left mouse button
  • Interact: E
  • Shop: F

Growing plants: You can plant plants around your cottage by using seed bags. To make the plants grow, you need to water them everyday.

Slimes: At night, murderous slimes will spawn everywhere. You can get coins and other items by killing them.

Shopping: You can buy seeds and other goods from the shop with coins.

Farming: You can grow sugar and wheat by planting the seeds on the farmland instead of the grass.

Baking: You can bake different cakes in the stone oven in your cottage. Eating cakes refills your hearts.
